description.@en: A warm glow emits from your hands, soothing the one you touch.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch moves one step up the Damage and Peril Condition Tracks positively. A Character may only gain the benefit of this Magick once per day.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they move three steps up the Damage and Peril Condition Tracks positively.

criticalFailure.@en: Your touch causes a corpulent decay to spread across the intended beneficiaryâ€™s wounds. They are now suffering from Filth Fever.

reagents.@en: Your bare hand, placed upon the chest of a victim

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
